Package Entities

Class OrderReport

java.lang.Object
Entities.OrderReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderReport extends Object implements Serializable
OrderReport class represents a report of orders according to a store(Entity) It has fields for the information of that report.
See Also:
